ygData.subject: Re: Re: Levels after hell levels
ygData.msgSnippet: No I didn t. I said third highest. ... -- Artificial Intelligence stands no chance against Natural Stupidity. GAT d- -p+(--) c++++ l++ u++ t- m--- W--- !v b+++
ygData.messageBody:
No I didn't. I said third highest.

On Thu, Feb 24/00, Wayne Sheppard <mrwayne@...> wrote:
> From: "Wayne Sheppard" <mrwayne@...>
>
> You forgot to scroll over to the right, where Ogre and Troll Shadowknights
> have the largest EXP penalty.
>
> > Date: Thu, 24 Feb 2000 12:23:02 -0800
> > From: jhenders@...
> > Subject: Re: Levels after hell levels
> >
> > On Thu, Feb 24/00, "Kevin L. Crawford" <Lyrnia@...> wrote:
> > >
> > > Which means that A) They've tinkered with the original Diku experience
> > > tables (NEEDED!) and B) The Hell levels and the H+1 levels are either
> > > extremely intentional or some collosolly bad coding. I'd personally
> support
> > > either opinion equally. I'm not that impressed with Verant's
> programming
> > > prowess.
> > >
> >
> > I don't think anyone's posted this to this list yet, but the people
> > behind showeq have posted the experience tables for a bunch of classes
> > as derived from watching the packets with showeq. You can see them at
> > http://www.hackersquest.gomp.ch/eqexp.html. Interestingly, it looks like
> > the wood elf bard is the third highest experience penalty class, having
> > the same experience table as a dark elf shadowknight.
>
>
>
